Name: Seasons With Furry
About the game: Seasons With Furry - is a puzzle game where you need to assemble a complete image from several pieces. Assemble one big image from small images and you will be able to move to a new level as well as enjoy already assembled images in a special gallery. Features: Size range from 9 to 25 pieces Simple mouse control Traditional logical gameplay Steam Achievements Credits: The game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
